text: Ana nehuno Raba kumate vahera zamavarege'za kazokzo eri'za vahe mani'ne'za, so eri'zanki, saumenteti eri erizanki, piki tunteti eri'zanki, brikima kreno trohu eri'za zamige'za eri'naze. Maka Amoni rankumatamimpi vahera ana erizanke'za zami'ne. Ana huteno Deviti'a maka sondia vahe'a zamavarege'za ete Jerusalemi vu'naze.
